description: Tottenham transfer news: Kane wanted by Bayern Munich and PSG
title: Tottenham transfer news: Kane wanted by Bayern Munich and PSG
title_page: Tottenham transfer news: Kane wanted by Bayern Munich and PSG - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bayern Munich executives are flying to London for a new round of talks with Tottenham over an Â£86m deal for England forward Harry Kane, who turns 30 on Friday. (Telegraph - subscription required, external)
Paris St-Germain also believe they are in the mix to sign Kane if Tottenham choose to sell him. (Sky Sports, external)
